title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 § 573.3 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 § 573.3 - Scope

State Regulations

These regulations (§§
573.3
-573.8) apply to all faculty
and staff employed by State University of New York College of Agriculture and

Technology at Cobleskill, Cobleskill Auxiliary Services, Research Foundation, College Alumni Association, or College Foundation employees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§
573.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
